answers.answer: Btw I'm only 21 so that's why it freaks me out because I feel like I'm too young for all this like I've been really depressed because of it like my life is barely starting and I feel sick all the time my bones and muscles hurt my head hurts I get the fuzzy lightheaded feeling my heart beats super fast especially after eating or when laying down like my anxiety is getting soo bad. The doctor told me I have generalized anxiety other than the thyroid problem and vitamin d problem but idk tomorrow I have a doctors appointment so I should be ok

HiThis is the diabetes board I cant help with most of your problems.  I would find an MD that would help me.Its normal for BP to fluctuate.As for diabetes its unfortunate that the medical community keeps harping on fasting BG (blood sugar).The fasting BG is the LAST thing that goes bad when  person becomes diabetic. the first thing to go is PP BG (post eating BG)  What is your BG 1 hour after eating the biggest meal of the day, That will tell us more about your Pancreas health than your fasting number.

I'm having an ultra sound on my pancreas. If they do find something wrong with my pancreas does this mean I might be diabetic? I have lower back pain. But since I've been getting lightheaded and fast heart rate after eating and my arms, hands, legs and feet have been hurting as well . I urinate frequently and I'm always hungry but the doctor is doing more test on my thyroid I just got my free t3 and t4 checked out. I hope everything will be ok
Diabetes does not change the ultrasound.AGAIN  what was you 1 hour post meal BG reading.
They never tested me for that just my 10 hour fastin glucose level

question: Ok so I had a physical done almost 3 months ago now and my glucose level came back at 88 fasting for 10 hours which mean I'm not diabetic but I found out my vitamin d level was at 19 which I started taking vitamin d3 pills once a day and I've been having soo much pain everywhere I also found out my tsh level was at 0.58 so I should be getting more test done but I'm hungry all the time, I pee frequently, my legs have been hurting, my heart has been beating really fast after eating, I don't understand all this started happening after my physical I've also been have anxiety and depression and muscle and joint pain, tingly sensation on my hand and feet. Thinning of the skin. And bruising very easily I don't know if I'm diabetic or pre diabetic the doctor told me everything was ok should I get my glucose checked again ? I feel like that's way to fast to become diabetic. I had really bad anxiety attacks that left me in the ER like 3 times and they would always say I'm fine but people with thyroid problems get anxiety idk I've been stressing like there's no other my blood pressure has been going up and down I hate going to the doctor and I feel like I'm always on this site just venting.
title: Diabetic or not?
